sentence: Joe Manchin (D-WV), Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ), Mark Kelly (D-AZ), and Maggie Hassan (D-NH) have all urged Biden to reverse the decision.
author: John Binder
title: More Vulnerable Democrats Blast Biden’s Ending Title 42 at Border

sentence: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy is opposed, of course, but so are several Democrat senators — Joe Manchin, Kyrsten Sinema, Mark Kelly, Mark Warner, and Maggie Hassan are warning that Biden’s decision to open the borders even further will result in nothing but a surge of new border crossers.
author: Nate Jackson /
title: The Border Is About to Get Even Worse

sentence: But rather than view it as a public health victory, some moderate Democrats see a huge political liability, leaving them furious that the White House ended policy ahead of a tough midterm election… Sen. Joe Manchin (D-W.Va.) called it a “frightening decision.” Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.) called it “wrong.” And Sen. Maggie Hassan (D-N.H.) said the Biden administration “does not appear to be ready” for the surge in migration that could result.
author: Mike LaChance
title: Obama’s DHS Secretary Jeh Johnson Against Ending Title 42, Says Southern Border Not Sustainable
